Welcome to NooPolis!

`[` Welcome to NooPolis `]`

NooPolis is an online directory that connects people on PlanetEarth through an OpenSocialNetwork.

We have opened up NooPolis for popular consumption at SingularAcademy

You can use NooPolis to:
 * Search for people at your school
 * Find out who are in your classes
 * Look up your friend's friends
 * See a visualization of your SocialNetwork

To get started, you can LogIn with
 * FaceBook
 * GoogleInc
 * TwittEr
 * LinkedIn
